admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project is designed to
            manufacture most of the equipment required for power
            generation, steel mills, and chemical and petrochemical
            plants. It would consist of: (a) foundry and forge shops (b)
            fabrication shops (c) machine shops (d) assembly and test
            shops (e) support facilities (f) other auxiliary facilities
            (g) technical assistance.
